lead_paragraph: The pieces are all there for Cincinnati to be a top team, but how well they deal with adversity should offer a clue as to how serious they should be taken as a Super Bowl contender.

headline.main: St. Louis Rams at Cincinnati Bengals Preview

snippet: The pieces are all there for Cincinnati to be a top team, but how well they deal with adversity should offer a clue as to how serious they should be taken as a Super Bowl contender.
